references.paper_title: Improved algorithms for linear stochastic bandits
references.reason: This paper provides improved algorithms for linear stochastic bandits, a fundamental concept in multi-armed bandits, which are leveraged in this paper for prompt optimization.

references.paper_title: Minimax policies for adversarial and stochastic bandits
references.reason: This paper introduces minimax policies for adversarial and stochastic bandits, which are foundational for understanding the theoretical guarantees of the algorithms used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Best arm identification in multi-armed bandits
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in best arm identification, which is the core problem tackled in the prompt optimization problem addressed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Finite-time analysis of the multiarmed bandit problem
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational finite-time analysis of the multi-armed bandit problem, which is crucial for understanding the efficiency and performance of the algorithms used in this work.

references.paper_title: Regret analysis of stochastic and nonstochastic multi-armed bandit problems
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of regret analysis in multi-armed bandits, which is essential for understanding the theoretical underpinnings of the algorithms used in this paper.
